alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 10:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL POLK COUNTY THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1010 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haines City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Mulberry, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Polk City, and Lake Hamilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
